Hi, 

> am. At what
> point does a unit test of an aggregating object, or subclass, 
> become an
> integration test? My head hurts.

My home-grown definition is: When the object(s) under test depend
on slow, complex external resources. e.g. databases, filesystems, 
user interfaces(?), remote objects, ...

I never looked up an official definition, maybe i should.

Bernd
subject: RE: [junit] TestCase Dependency Hierarchy
